article_title: Colorado State's marching band, as seen from a GoPro camera
article_text:
The Colorado State marching band has performed in numerous local, national and international events, from the 2013 St. Patrick’s Festival and Parade in Dublin, to Denver Broncos’ games.

You’ve probably seen them from above, sitting the stands or watching them on TV. You may have even seen them from field level. But you’ve never seen them this close, through a GoPro camera attached to a trombone. Enjoy.

og.description: Colorado State attached a GoPro camera to one of its marching band's trombones to give a unique view during a performance.

article_summary:
But you’ve never seen them this close, through a GoPro camera attached to a trombone.
You’ve probably seen them from above, sitting the stands or watching them on TV.
The Colorado State marching band has performed in numerous local, national and international events, from the 2013 St. Patrick’s Festival and Parade in Dublin, to Denver Broncos’ games.
You may have even seen them from field level.
